comments.text:
Ehm... Americans know that criminality is the result of a situation which 
overwhelms my own skills, then I am more likely to commit crimes, for 
example poverty is in most cases the main reason. In Europe we got simple 
social systems for that purpose, they raise the standart of poverty and 
decimate the number of criminality to a minimum. Imagine you are black, of 
course you have to face a lot of discrimination, you grew up in the slum, 
you dont know your father, your mother gets cancer and the treatment costs 
50000$ or she dies in 2 months and your friend jimmy who got the same 
problem offers to rob a bank with you, additionally you are very hungry, 
you have nothing to lose anyway and you would land on the street without 
your mother. Is that fair? Would you do it differently? So in the end you 
rather pay ~2.5 mio $ per execution (for example) than saving money, work 
force and human lives with some simple social systems, because otherwise 
you would lose your "freedom". ;D﻿
comments.author: Dara Marc Sasmaz

comments.text:
+James Hemesley I am aware of most of your social services, but the point 
is that on the other hand these services are mostly ineffective, because 
either they give "too much" that there wont be any motivation anymore to 
work (in Germany you really get the minimum for example) or through 
compromises with had to be made with the republican party these systems are 
just too weak. But all that needs time and we had a century to improve and 
optimize our social systems and still nobody would say that they are 
perfect. 

I have no clue about your "races". To classify humans into "races" is 
considered as racism here in Europe, so I think I know what you mean as 
much as I know you somehow distingiush between "Whites", African American, 
Latinos (whatever the difference is between Latinos and "Whites") and 
Eastern Asians which you just call "Asians". I already chatted with a lot 
of US people over YT (probably like 400) and of course a lot of came up 
like you with the racist argument and this is always a little bit strange 
for me, because you are probably also an adult and for you randomly 
selected cosmetic attributes of one person are a valid explanation for his 
or her behavior. 

In Europe we just distingiush between nationality or national heritage. 
Germany for example got today 20% of its population with a non-european 
background (including me), but if you are born here or just got the German 
passport you are a German (also statistically). 

You know, around 20-30 years ago we had this discussion which was really 
big in German media and politics, which was about especially the turkish 
community in Germany and the partly foundation of "ghettos" and "parallel 
societies" and "how can it be that some of them cant even speak German!!" 
and many German politicians said "this cant be, these 'evil' people living 
by our social systems, not contributing to our society, dont care about us, 
blablablabla" and then we had experts who examined and explored this 
phenomena and in the end they came to the conclusion that the moment the 
first big wave of immigrants arrived here in Germany they were 
discriminated and the Germans avoided them, didnt want to talk to them, 
didnt want to help them, having thousands of prejudices (and some still 
got) and so these people sticked together and founded their own societies 
and so we simply found out that "we" are the problem not them and since 
then a lot has changed. What I just told you is something you already learn 
in 7th grade in Germany, we have thousand of programs for better 
integration and we abolished tuitions to give everyone equal chances, 
because our ethos is "work hard and you can make it!" (but even here in 
Europe it is not a secret that the system isnt perfect either and that 
wealthier kids still got way higher chances to become successful).. 

So you have to ask yourself how your "black" community got there in the 
first place, which obstacles they have to meet probably everyday in their 
life and then if it isnt understandable that after all these decades or 
even centuries they are just tired and just know "becoming a pimp or a drug 
dealer is the only way to become something in this country, because all the 
other doors are closed for a person like me" (principles of evolution and 
natural selection: Every life form searches his space where he can survive).

Integration and Discrimination are selffullfilling prophecies. You point at 
someone and tell the others "look! He is bad, lazy and a criminal!" and 
this person will encounter a lot of obstacles in his life which will make 
it harder for him to be successful, maybe one of him will become president, 
the other a rapper, the other one an athlete and one a CEO, but the vast 
majority wont make it because of these sick obstacles and they will fail 
and in the end they will have to live by the welfare system and/or becoming 
criminal and you will stand there again, pointing at them saying "told'ya!".

In Germany the most racist people are the ones living in the poorest parts. 
The "native" Germans blame the other nationalities for their misery and the 
Germans with another national background blame the "natives" and through 
this hatred towards each other this shit goes on and on and on. But 
recognizing the problem is the first step to improvement.
comments.author: Dara Marc Sasmaz

comments.text:
+Dara Marc Sasmaz Firstly, like most Europeans, your understanding of 
American social services is completely misguided. There are plenty of 
social services for poor people in America. Food stamps, welfare, free cell 
phones, and sub standardized housing just to name a few. Personally, I know 
people who don't work at all and have all their needs met by government 
support. Europeans I meet abroad are usually unaware of this, and tend to 
make arrogant and ignorant remarks not dissimilar to yours. 

Secondly, it's usually only white people who never lived in multiracial 
communities that blame crime on poverty. I grew up in a multiracial 
community and had lots of black friends growing up. In their culture the 
drug dealers, pimps, and gangsters are idolized. If a guy spends time in 
prison he'll get more respect for it later on. There's no doubt American 
police are racist, but there's a simple reason for this. Racial profiling 
black men if an efficient way to catch criminals.

comments.text:
I also find it interesting that these idiots at FOX like to point out that 
crime in the black community is about blacks killing other blacks. While 
part of that is true because where is a person likely to commit a crime but 
within their own neighborhood. The other reality is that it's not only 
about killing, it's crime in general. Doesn't it make sense that white 
crimes are also against other whites in their own neighborhood?

If you check the FBI crime statistics that come out every year, you will 
find that whites still commit the majority of crimes, WHITES. And yes 25% 
of those crimes are against other whites. Blacks come in second and commit 
about 50% of crimes against other blacks. As far as black on black 
homicides go estimates are 93%. Guess what it is for white on white 
homicides? It's 85% yes 85%, see how the whole story can change your 
attitude? And these are old numbers that were declining. 
http://www.politifact.com/florida/statements/2013/jul/17/tweets/look-statistic-blacks-and-murder/ 
 also check  http://www.bjs.gov/content/pub/pdf/bvvc.pdf﻿

comments.text:
FYI
TO ALL who like o'reilly ASSume
In the United States, a White person is almost six times more likely to be 
killed by another White person ...
39.4K793
When White on White crime takes place it’s never talked about the way it is 
when Blacks commit crimes.

In the United States, a White person is almost six times more likely to be 
killed by another White person than by a Black person, according to FBI 
homicide data. In 2011, there were more cases of Whites killing Whites than 
there were Blacks killing Blacks. However, the mainstream media obsesses 
over Black on Black violence and rarely mentions the problem of White on 
White violence.

These statistics have not led to a media outcry about the problem of White 
on White crime or the unique pathology of the White community. Nor has the 
White community stood up to demand change in their community like the Black 
community does when trying to tackle instances of Black on Black crime.

Most White people don’t kill White people. Yet media pundits, from Fox 
News’ Bill O’Reilly to CNN’s Don Lemon, have no problem using the phrase 
“Black on Black violence” despite the fact that most Black people don’t 
kill Black people.

When the news talks about gang-related deaths, they treat it as an almost 
exclusively Black problem. However, according to the Bureau of Justice 
Statistics, for the period of 1980 to 2008, a majority (53.3 percent) of 
gang homicides were committed by White offenders, and the majority of gang 
homicide victims (56.5 percent) were White.

When was the last time you’ve seen on the news, discussions about a 
White-gang problem?

Crimes committed by White people are explained as deviations of the 
individual but have nothing to do with race, but crimes committed by Blacks 
or Latino’s are somehow attributed to race. Gang-bangers from South Chicago 
have somehow become a symbol that Black men are to be feared, but you don’t 
get the same fear that one could attach to the brutal murders committed by 
Neo-Nazi skinheads.

According to statistics from the Justice Department, White men are more 
likely to kill than any other racial group. When it comes to how and why 
people kill, Black men do, in fact, outnumber Whites in gun-related 
homicides, but especially drug-related offenses. However, White men top the 
list in most all other categories.

When the Bureau of Justice Statistics collected homicidal rates from 1980 
to 2008, they found that compared to Blacks, Whites were more likely to 
kill children, the elderly, family members, and their significant others. 
They commit more sex-related crimes, gang related crimes, and are more 
likely to kill at their places of employment.

So why does America still perpetuate the lie of Black criminality?﻿
comments.author: Barbara holliman

REALITY CHECK from 7 chololate messengers............1911 to 2014.

1911
A few excerpts from Booker T Washington in his book, "My Larger Education, 
Being Chapters from My Experience" , Ch. V , Read it  on Google Books.

Page 119 to 120:
"I am afraid that there is a certain class of race-problem solvers who
don't want the patient to get well, because as long as the disease holds
out they have not only an easy means of making a living, but also an
easy medium through which to make themselves prominent before the public"

Page 118:
"There is another class of coloured people who make a business of keeping
the troubles, the wrongs, and the hardships of the Negro race before
the public. Having learned that they are able to make a living out of
their troubles, they have grown into the settled habit of advertising
their wrongs — partly because they want sympathy and partly because it
pays. Some of these people do not want the Negro to lose his grievances,
because they do not want to lose their jobs."

1961
"Do you know that Negroes are 10% of the population of St. Louis and are 
responsible for 58% of its crimes? We've got to face that. And we've got to 
do something about our moral standards. We know that there are many things 
wrong in the white world, but there are many things wrong in the black 
world, too. We can't keep on blaming the white man. There are things we 
must do for ourselves."
-MLK (1961)﻿

1995
“There is nothing more painful to me at this stage in my life than to walk 
down the street and hear footsteps... then turn around and see somebody 
white and feel relieved.”
― Jesse Jackson

2001
Black author John McWhorter in "Losing the Race explores the three main 
components of the black cultural virus: the cults of victimology, 
separatism, and anti-intellectualism that are making blacks their own worst 
enemies in the struggle for success".

crime.
Lake County Prosecutor Bernard Carter told a gathering of the Lake County 
Advancement Committee that it does not matter how many criminals his office 
and others like it put behind bars if officials do not begin a conversation

2014

Aug 21, 2014 - Carson says that for every black male killed by police, 
there are 50 killed by other black males, and that's the problem Americans 
should be concerned about ...

NUMBER SEVEN.........

A MINORITY VIEW
Profiling young blacks makes sense
Walter E. Williams points to statistics showing link between race, youth 
and crime

Twelve years ago, a black Washington, D.C., commissioner warned cabbies, 
most of whom were black, against picking up dangerous-looking passengers. 
She described “dangerous-looking” as a “young black guy … with shirttail 
hanging down longer than his coat, baggy pants, unlaced tennis shoes.” She 
also warned cabbies to stay away from low-income black neighborhoods. Did 
that make the D.C. commissioner a racist?

comments.text:
DOUBLE STANDARD?    The lamestream media created front page copy from WHITE 
frat boys on a bus chanting a nigg tune, but when a BLACK predator shoots 
up a spring break party it doesn't warrant similar high intensity 
coverage.........

Last Updated Mar 28, 2015 3:17 PM EDT

PANAMA CITY BEACH, Fla. -- Seven people were injured, some critically, 
during an early-morning spray of gunfire Saturday at a spring break party 
on the Florida Panhandle, police said. An Alabama man was quickly 
apprehended and charged with attempted murder. The sheriff's office said 
several of the victims were students from Alabama A&M University in Panama 
City Beach for spring break.

David Jamichael Daniels, 22, of Mobile, Alabama, was charged with seven 
counts of attempted murder and jailed awaiting a first court appearance. A 
.40-caliber handgun believed to have been used was found in the yard of a 
nearby home.


At least three were critically injured: Kearria Freed, 20, who was shot in 
the head; Devanta Moore, 21, who was shot in the chest; and Henton 
Franklin, 22, who was shot in the side. Three others were listed in stable 
condition: Jacole Young, 22, who police said was shot in the back three 
times; Kelli Curry, 21, who was shot in the leg; and Tykeria Ethridge, 22, 
who was shot in the neck and shoulder.
A seventh victim - Anesia Powell, 20 - was shot in the left arm, chest, and 
knee, and was undergoing surgery Saturday.

VS

Mar 9, 2015 - Fraternity Caught on Video Singing Racist Song .

comments.author: RepublicansAreNazis

comments.text:
It is the Government that decides who is allowed to have a gun and who 
isn't allowed to have a gun.  It is the Obama administration that decided 
recently to add a second question about race on a form 4473... are you 
Hispanic?

They ask you if you are Hispanic in the question that is right after the 
question that asks, "what race are you?". So they ask what race you are not 
once, but twice. If you lie on either question you can be sent to prison 
for the crime of perjury.

Then, after answering these questions, the gun dealer is requried to gall 
the ATF and tell them what the potential buyer said on the form. Based on 
what is on the form, the ATF decides if the person should get a gun or not.

I do not understand what the NRA has to do with Travon's inability to get a 
gun. The NRA has NEVER asked for a law that gave preference to race. There 
is no mention of race on the NRA membership application form and, unlike 
the ATF and the Obama administration, the NRA does not discriminate against 
any race.   Travon Martin could have applied for NRA membership if he 
wished and would gladly have been accepted as a member.

Travon Martin was prohibited by both Florida State and also Federal law 
from owning a handgun.﻿
